alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 8:33PM MDT until May 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... Eastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 833 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Boone, or 29 miles east of Pueblo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Crowley and eastern Pueblo Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
